channel.title: Quite a Few things I need help with
channel.description:
1) The server I downloaded was already coded some and tested by a bunch of people I assume, because there are already many characters made. One of which is owner of the server, Regisoul. I give him Power=0 and my character Speakmore power=3 and I become owner. But here is the weird part. When you log in as Regisoul, it says the Owner has logged in blah blah blah in the chat bar. He also can use the I guess Owner only commands, ::mypos specifically, even though he doesn't have power, nor a crown. So is there any way I can change this? I've already went into my source and editted everything under his name and replaced it with Speakmore in the Source file
2) How do I change the starter items you get. This server was supposed to be pk/eco, I want it to be spawn and pk obviously.
3) How do I allow players to spawn, infact, I myself, can't even spawn as Admin (even on Regisoul. Is the code ::item 1 1 or something?) After they can spawn, how can I limit it so they can't spawn what is in the shops that I'm going to make
4) Mini-games were already created, I want to change it I guess, so they aren't there. Is there a file I can delete to do so?
5) How do I change my teleports, so if I want to make a SKilling tele into tele to like, fally, because I don't need skilling in a spawn server.
6) How do I change the items in the shops, the NPC's name, and how many pkp it is going to cost?
That will be all for now as I will want to complete this first before moving on to the other stuff.... I'm extremely new to coding, as I only opened up this stuff yesterday. IF you guys could help me out, that would be amazing. But basically I'm almost asking you to code the server for me sadly, but I can't find any other way to understand where to change this stuff at.
Sorry for all the work, but thanks to all of you who can/will help.

item.title: Quite a Few things I need help with
item.dc:creator: @Speakmore Speakmore
item.description:
@Speakmore wrote:

Indeed

A lot of the places you wanted me to check, like the files, I couldn’t find in my source.

Read full topic

Speakmore:

Then they must be amazing x 500

Indeed, I mean look at Jagex, just giving an example, we are working off of their work that they created from scratch and look at them now. It may have taken them some time but they have came far from RuneScape Classic.

Use WordPad to open it and Commands.java is located at: src\server\model\player\packets\Commands.java
[/quote]
Thanks man, I can’t give you rep cause mine is only 10
Maybe I should just pm you with my concerns, you are good ith this stuff :)[/quote]

Thanks for the compliment. There are people out there that are better though.

item.title: Quite a Few things I need help with
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

All those things are server sided, wrong section.

Starter items: PlayerAssistant.java

Item/Pickup: Commands.java

Minigames: several files but just make it so they can’t get to them unless you absolutely want to take them out.

Teleports: ClickingButtons.java

Items in shop: shops.cfg

special shop item prices: ShopAssistant.java

Read full topic
item.source: Quite a Few things I need help with

item.title: Quite a Few things I need help with
item.dc:creator: @looted_y00 looted y00
item.description:
@looted_y00 wrote:

Firstly make sure his name is no where in client.java if you cant spawn either ::item or ::pickup is set only to a player name and not player rights so here is a command for delta you have not told me a source so i can not help you as much as both of use would like if you are not on delta and use this is will crash your source!

            [code]    if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) {
	        String[] args = command.split(" ");
         if(args.length == 3) {
		int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
		int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
		if (newItemID <= 25000 && newItemID >= 0) {
			addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
		} else {
			sM("No such item.");
		}
	} else {
		sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100");
	}
    }

}[/code]

And this means if your player rights are equal to or over 2 (admin) then you can use this command. and if the id is equal to or over 0 and equal to or lower than 25000 spawn item and you want players to spawn so change
if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 2) {
to if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 0) {
but if you dont want people to pick up certain items you must add this

                   if (command.startsWith("pickup")) {
                        try {
                            String[] token = command.split(" ");
                            int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
                            int newItemAmount = 1;

                            try {
                                newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                            } catch (Exception e) {
                                newItemAmount = 1;
                            }
if(newItemID !=8500  && newItemID != 8504){
                            if (newItemID <= 100000 && newItemID >= 0) {
if(pvpmode || isclangame) {
sM("You cannot spawn items with your PvP mode on.");
} else {
                                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
}
                            } else {
                                sM("you cant spawn this item.. nice try:P");
                            }
} else {
sM("you cant spawn this item.. nice try:P");
}
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            sM("I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::pickup 555 1.");
                        }
                    }

this means you cant spawn item 8500 or 8504 so change 8500 or 8504 to the items you dont want people to spawn

and just add

to add a new item to stop spawning
[size=24pt]Oh and dont forget to compile! and if you get errors post them and i try and fix please rep me :)[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Quite a Few things I need help with
item.dc:creator: @Speakmore Speakmore
item.description:
@Speakmore wrote:

  1. The server I downloaded was already coded some and tested by a bunch of people I assume, because there are already many characters made. One of which is owner of the server, Regisoul. I give him Power=0 and my character Speakmore power=3 and I become owner. But here is the weird part. When you log in as Regisoul, it says the Owner has logged in blah blah blah in the chat bar. He also can use the I guess Owner only commands, ::mypos specifically, even though he doesn’t have power, nor a crown. So is there any way I can change this? I’ve already went into my source and editted everything under his name and replaced it with Speakmore in the Source file

  2. How do I change the starter items you get. This server was supposed to be pk/eco, I want it to be spawn and pk obviously.

  3. How do I allow players to spawn, infact, I myself, can’t even spawn as Admin (even on Regisoul. Is the code ::item 1 1 or something?) After they can spawn, how can I limit it so they can’t spawn what is in the shops that I’m going to make

  5. How do I change my teleports, so if I want to make a SKilling tele into tele to like, fally, because I don’t need skilling in a spawn server.

That will be all for now as I will want to complete this first before moving on to the other stuff… I’m extremely new to coding, as I only opened up this stuff yesterday. IF you guys could help me out, that would be amazing. But basically I’m almost asking you to code the server for me sadly, but I can’t find any other way to understand where to change this stuff at.

Sorry for all the work, but thanks to all of you who can/will help.
